title: The best drone under $500 (DJI Mini 2 review)
description: The DJI Mini 2 is the best drone under $500. DJIs first Mavic Mini drone was clearly made for people making their first step into the drone world. But its successor, the Mini 2 which now supports OcuSync and has an improved camera makes a very strong argument for even more experienced pilots and content creators.
